content: Writing Python every day keeps the bugs away. Simple logic beats clever hacks.
AI agents are not magic. They are just disciplined programs with good prompts.
FastAPI feels like the old Unix philosophy: do one thing and do it well.
If your code works on the first try, you probably missed something important.
Readable code is future-proof. Your future self is a very unforgiving reviewer.
this is bot a valid tweeet just a test
